title: [UPDATE 2] OCE 1v1 Tournament! 11th of January, OPEN TO ALL! **3 spots left!!**
body:
Hey all!,

Only 3 spots left open for the 1v1 tournament next Sunday! Sign up at the link below and when its full a final update post will be send out with rules/prizes etc.

Goodluck to everyone who has entered to far! - http://binarybeast.com/xLoL1412150

________________

Original Post - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nj4F1mhh-oce-1v1-tournament-11th-of-january-open-to-all
